title: The Industrial Disaster That Makes Chernobyl Look Like Kindergarten
itunes:title: The Industrial Disaster That Makes Chernobyl Look Like Kindergarten
description:
In Episode 76, Robert is joined by Jamie Loftus to discuss the worst industrial disaster in history: Bhopal, India.
